name: BIENA Chickpea Snacks, Sea Salt | Gluten Free | Vegan | Dairy Free | Plant Based Protein (Single 5 oz. Bag)
short_description: Contains 1 - 5oz bag of Biena Chickpea Snacks, Sea Salt (packaging may vary)
Light, crispy roasted chickpeas dusted with sea salt. Ideal healthy snacks for kids and adults
With 5-6 grams of plant based protein and fiber, Biena snacks are low calorie and low fat
Our vegan snacks are non-GMO, grain free, gluten free, dairy free, and nut free
Enjoy a chickpea snack straight out of the bag or as a topping for soups, salads & desserts
product_description: Enjoy the perfect combination of light and crispy texture with our 1-pack of Sea Salt roasted chickpeas. These delicious chickpeas snacks are packed with plant-based protein and fiber to satisfy hunger and promote gut health. Versatile for any occasion, they can be enjoyed instead of chips or as a healthy topping for salads, soups, and other meals. With a light dusting of sea salt, they offer a flavorful yet balanced taste. Made with real, whole-food ingredients, these gluten-free, non-GMO, grain-free, dairy-free, and peanut/tree nut-free Biena chickpeas are proudly made in the USA. Perfect for anyone seeking a nutritious, vegan protein snack, they come in a resealable package, ready to eat anytime.

name: Desi Kitchen Roasted Chana 28oz (800g) | Roasted Chickpeas | Non GMO | Unsalted | Authentic Indian Products | Product of India | Indian Snack
short_description: 100% Roasted Chickpeas – Made from high-quality desi chana, roasted to perfection for a crunchy, satisfying snack.
Unsalted & Non-GMO – A naturally healthy option with no added salt or preservatives; ideal for clean eating.
Authentic Indian Taste – Enjoy the traditional Indian flavor of this popular street-style snack from the heart of India.
Protein-Rich & Fiber-Packed – Great source of plant-based protein and dietary fiber for sustained energy and better digestion.
Product of India – Sourced, roasted, and packed in India to bring you a genuine and fresh snacking experience.
Net Weight : 28oz (800g)
product_description: Desi Kitchen Roasted Chana is a crunchy, wholesome snack made from premium-quality roasted chickpeas. With no added sugars and a satisfying taste, this snack offers a naturally simple ingredient – just roasted chickpeas. Ideal for those looking for a ready-to-eat option that fits a variety of dietary lifestyles. Packaged in a 28oz (800g) resealable pouch to preserve freshness, this product is a convenient choice for home or on-the-go snacking. With every pack, you're getting a product of India Please note that the product is processed on shared equipment that also handles peanuts, tree nuts, wheat, mustard, soy, and sesame.

name: Roasted Chickpeas Snack – Crunchy Garbanzo Beans, Healthy Bean Snack, Crispy Chickpeas, Chickpea Snacks, High Protein – 8.8 oz Bag
short_description: AUTHENTIC ROASTED CHICKPEAS – Enjoy the classic crunch of roasted chickpeas, also known as garbanzo beans. These crispy legumes are a traditional snack made with natural ingredients, offering protein-rich, fiber-packed goodness in every bite.

HEALTHY SNACK OPTION – A guilt-free bean snack with plant-based protein, fiber, and essential nutrients. Perfect for vegan and gluten-free diets, these crunchy chickpeas satisfy hunger while fueling your body with long-lasting energy.

FULL NATURAL FLAVOR – Lightly roasted chickpeas bring out their authentic nutty taste and crispy texture. Unlike canned chickpeas, these baked chickpeas deliver a wholesome crunch with no artificial flavors, additives, or seed oils.

RESEALABLE PACKAGE – Packed in a convenient 8.8 oz resealable bag, these roasted chickpeas stay fresh and crunchy after opening. Ideal for on-the-go snacking, sharing with family, or storing at home for a quick protein boost.

VERSATILE & DELICIOUS – Enjoy straight from the bag, sprinkle over salads, or use in chickpea snacks recipes. A smart alternative to chips and nuts, making them perfect for parties, lunch boxes, or as a healthy everyday treat.

name: Sincerely Nuts Roasted and Salted Chickpeas (3 LBS) Plant-Based Protein-Garbanzo Beans-Great Snack or Side Dish Alternative-Vegan, Kosher & Gluten-Free-Unrivaled Freshness-Irresistibly Tasty
short_description: ✅ PERFECTLY ROASTED AND SALTED: We know you and the whole family will go sincerely nuts over these salty, roasted snacks. Grab some for a trip out with the family, a pick-me-up snack for a hike, or bring them along to work for a healthy mid-day treat.

✅ CURB YOUR CRAVINGS- Want to stay fuller for longer? Enter our delicious chickpeas. Chickpeas are famous for their highly nutritious content, making them the perfect snack to hold back cravings. The high protein and fiber content keeps you feeling your best throughout the day!

✅ PLANT-BASED PROTEIN- Chickpeas can be a great alternative to meat, especially if you’re looking to cut down on your carbon footprint. Their protein is closely related to lentils and black beans. Add in some chickpeas instead of meat every once in a while to reap the benefits.

✅ INEXPENSIVE & TASTY MEAL OR SNACK- Chickpeas, also known as garbanzo beans, are an extremely cost-effective way to add some essential nutrients to your diet. Check out our easy Caesar salad recipe below!

✅UNRIVALED SOURCING QUALITY - At Sincerely Nuts, we’re committed to the highest quality natural ingredient sourcing and production processes. We’re proud to get our fresh, quality chickpeas from Mexico and Turkey.

name: Desi Kitchen Roasted Chana (Chickpeas) Unsalted 8.8oz (250g) PET Jar ~ No Preservatives, Product of India, Great Snack, Ready to Eat
short_description: PREMIUM SNACK: Roasted chickpeas (chana) offering a crunchy, protein-rich snacking experience without added salt
NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Made with pure chickpeas and no preservatives, maintaining authentic taste and nutritional value
CONVENIENT PACKAGING: Comes in a sturdy 8.8oz (250g) PET jar that helps maintain freshness and is easy to store
READY TO EAT: Perfect grab-and-go snack requiring no preparation, ideal for work, travel, or home consumption
AUTHENTIC IMPORT: Genuine Indian roasted chana, bringing traditional flavors directly from its country of origin
product_description: Discover the perfect healthy snacking solution with these roasted chana (chickpeas) - a traditional Indian snack that's both nutritious and delicious. These unsalted roasted chickpeas come in a convenient 8.8oz (250g) PET jar, making them ideal for snacking at home, work, or on the go. Each chickpea is carefully roasted to achieve the perfect crunch, preserving its natural flavors without any added preservatives. As a ready-to-eat snack straight from India, these roasted chana offer a protein-rich alternative to regular snacks. The resealable PET jar helps maintain freshness and makes portion control easier. Whether you're looking for a quick energy boost, a protein-packed snack, or simply want to try an authentic Indian treat, these roasted chickpeas are an excellent choice. They're versatile enough to be enjoyed on their own or added to your favorite trail mix.

name: Bayside Candy Roasted & Salted Chickpeas – Crunchy Savory Snack (1LB)
short_description: Simple & Wholesome – Whole chickpeas roasted until crunchy, lightly salted for balanced flavor.
Plant-Based Nutrition – Rich in protein and fiber, making them a satisfying, better-for-you snack option.
Versatile Snack or Topper – Enjoy straight from the bag, or add to salads, soups, or snack mixes for extra crunch.
Light & Crispy Texture – Golden roasted chickpeas with a crisp bite that satisfies savory cravings.
product_description: Snack smarter with Bayside Candy Roasted & Salted Chickpeas, a wholesome and flavorful treat that delivers both crunch and nutrition. Lightly roasted to perfection and finished with just the right touch of salt, these golden chickpeas offer a satisfying bite that’s naturally packed with plant-based protein and fiber. Perfect for on-the-go snacking, topping salads, or adding to trail mixes, roasted chickpeas bring savory satisfaction without guilt. With their crisp texture and roasted flavor, they’re an ideal alternative to chips, pretzels, or nuts—giving you all the crunch with none of the compromise.
